name: International Institute of Sports Management
description: IISM, which pioneered Sports Management education in India, is proud to welcome its students and partners to its sprawling, new campus, at Fleet House on Andheri Kurla Road, Marol Naka, Mumbai. The state-of-the-art facility is a significant milestone for IISM, as it enters its tenth year. The campus is embellished with all the facilities and amenities that characterise an educational institution that is dynamic, proactive and most importantly, student-friendly. The classrooms are centrally air-conditioned and comprise audio-visual equipment to facilitate interactive learning. There is a research lab as well. The students will have access to Wi-Fi (complimentary), refreshments through the day and breakout areas in which to socialise. The new campus is accessible from across the city of Mumbai by road, rail and metro. It is situated ten minutes from the international airport. IISM remains committed to the cause that it pioneered – to nurture and mould sports management professionals who will do the country proud

enhanced_description: The International Institute of Sports Management (IISM), a pioneer in Sports Management education in India since 2010, offers full-time undergraduate and postgraduate degree programs in sports management and sports science in collaboration with the University of Mumbai. The institute emphasizes an innovative, sports industry-led curriculum and boasts highly qualified and experienced faculty directly from the sports industry. IISM is committed to providing students with practical industry experience through opportunities like internships. Its state-of-the-art campus in Mumbai, accessible by various transport modes and located ten minutes from the international airport, features centrally air-conditioned classrooms with audio-visual equipment for interactive learning, a research lab, complimentary Wi-Fi, refreshments, and social breakout areas, all designed to be student-friendly. IISM's core mission is to nurture and mould sports management professionals who will contribute significantly to the country's sports industry, focusing on accelerating skill development and learning efficiency.
